level.heading: Bounty.
level.text: The Mayor is authorized to offer and pay rewards for information that, in the opinion of the Mayor, leads to the apprehension and charging of any person for violating § 8-902(a) and the collection of a penalty or fine from the person.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-117, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-901.
